message: """"Sunny days, chasing the clouds away..."""" Sesame Street. And """"It's a beautiful day in the neighborhood..."""" Mister Rogers. I'm 50 and these shows, plus the Electric Company, influenced my life and deeply engrained in my happiest memories. Thank you, WNET .
